Pre-Game Insights: The new-look Indian T20 team will embark on a journey of self-discovery without Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli
The series is expected to be played entirely in Harare, Zimbabwe
Miscellaneous Highlights: The series is scheduled to be played from July 6, 2024
Others: Abhishek Sharma and Riyan Parag are expected to make their international debut during the series
Zimbabwe, led by Sikandar Raza, could prove to be a handful on nippy afternoons at the Harare Sports Club
Some solid performances in this series will keep these youngsters in contention for future when the first team players of the world champion side are back on national duty
